overview: Rose has been a marriage counselor for the past 10 years. She's seen a lot of couples in her office so she knows a lot about fixing their problems, mainly the sexual ones. Today, she meets Marina, a casting director who loves to have fun with her young models even though her boyfriend Doryann doesn't like it. Mike and Mya want to try swinging but they're a bit scared. Rose will show them that there is nothing to be afraid of. Rose really has a dream job.
title: The Marriage Counselor
